sentences.en: a website full of useless information
sentences.cn: 充斥着无用信息的网站

sentences.en: But I put it to you that they're useless.
sentences.cn: 但是我告诉你它们是没用的。

sentences.en: He made it a useless attempt to advise her.
sentences.cn: 他认为试图劝她是无用的.

sentences.en: He was useless at any game with a ball.
sentences.cn: 任何球类运动他都玩不好。

sentences.en: He's useless at DIY. He won'teven put up a shelf.
sentences.cn: 他自己动手能力太差，甚至连搭个架子都不会。

sentences.en: I still feel inadequate, useless and mixed up.
sentences.cn: 我仍然感到自己能力不够，毫无用处，整个儿一团糟。

sentences.en: In view of the facts, It'seems useless to continue.
sentences.cn: 鉴于这些事实, 继续下去似乎是无益的.

sentences.en: Peter is useless, far worse than I thought.
sentences.cn: 彼得真没用,比我想象的还要差.

sentences.en: Please cancel the words which are useless.
sentences.cn: 请把无用的词划掉。

sentences.en: She judged it a useless attempt to advise him.
sentences.cn: 她断定,给他提建议是徒劳的.

sentences.en: She sits at home all day, watching TV and feeling useless.
sentences.cn: 她整天坐在家里，看着电视，觉得自己一无是处。

sentences.en: Shockingly, this useless and dangerous surgery did not end until the 1930s.
sentences.cn: 令人震惊的是，这种既无效又危险的手术直到20世纪30年代才被废止。

sentences.en: The camel's feet, well adapted for dry sand, are useless on mud.
sentences.cn: 骆驼的蹄子虽然非常适合于在干沙上行走，碰到泥泞时却无计可施。

sentences.en: The doctor concluded that further treatment would be useless.
sentences.cn: 医生下了结论，进一步治疗是无益的。

sentences.en: The editor killed a few useless lines.
sentences.cn: 编辑删掉了几行无用的文字。

sentences.en: The measures were decried as useless.
sentences.cn: 这些措施受到指责，说是不起作用。

sentences.en: Their education system is useless.
sentences.cn: 他们的教育体制真差劲。

sentences.en: They wrote his suggestion off as a useless idea.
sentences.cn: 他们把他的建议看做是无用的想法。

sentences.en: This pen is useless.
sentences.cn: 这支笔没用了。

sentences.en: You may see yourself as useless, incompetent and blameworthy.
sentences.cn: 你也许会认为自己无用、不称职、应该受到指责。

words.tran_cn: 可用的；便于使用的（等于usable）
习惯的；二手的，使用过的
有用的，有益的；有帮助的

trans.tran_cn: 无用的，无效的，无价值的，差劲的，不怎么样的
trans.tran_en: not useful or effective in any way
